text:
@WhiteHouse The United States has AT LEAST  985,374 cases of coronavirus. 

That's 4.3 TIMES more cases than Spain, which is the next highest at 229,422.

AND more than TWICE AS MANY DEATHS as the next closest country,  Italy, at 26,977 deaths.

NOW there are tests  🙄
#70DayDeadlyDelay
